projects.title: Coffee Grabber
projects.about: A game about grabbing coffee, keeping other players from grabbing your coffee/first person shooter.
projects.stretchGoals: We would love to have this game also make you a cup of coffee. We would really love if the game could hurt you physically or at least make you cry.
projects.gamePlay: You run around at high speeds snatching piping hot coffee from the hands of your friends and loved ones.
projects.story: You are the COFFEE GRABBER life for you is GRABBING COFFEE that's it.

projects.title: Resident Weevil
projects.about: A game that is in no way related to the hit series 'Resident Evil'. Resident Weevil is about an innocent man just trying to get through a day of work and get home to his loving family.
projects.stretchGoals: We would love to have this game let you play as a woman. We would really love if the game could make you feel a range of emotions you never thought possible.
projects.gamePlay: You run around at low speeds trying to keep this guy from grabbing your coffee and hopefully make it through the day.
projects.story: You are not the COFFEE GRABBER your just a normal guy.

projects.title: Jump Dingo
projects.about: A game that tries to recreate a normal day at the office except with rabid dingos.
projects.stretchGoals: We would love to have this game also include wolverines as a selectable enemy class. We would like to create a realistic feeling of ennui in the player
projects.gamePlay: You run around at high speeds jumping over dingos and keeping the COFFEE GRABBER away from your piping hot coffee.
projects.story: You are the not COFFEE GRABBER your life is an endless hell of jumping dingos and spilling coffee.
